name: Arthur Hayes
content: Bitcoin's plunge signals coming AI credit crisis. If 20% of 72.1M knowledge workers lose jobs, ~$557B in consumer credit and mortgage defaults. Fed will respond with massive liquidity injection â†’ BTC new ATH. Short term pain, long term gain.

name: Anatoly Yakovenko
content: Revived McAfee's 'no bubble' Bitcoin call, referencing NVIDIA H200 GPU now at $40,000. 'Those of you who believe this is a bubble simply have not understood the new mathematics of the Boltzmann machine.'

name: Ben Zhou
content: Bybit hack 1 year anniversary update: ~$1.07B of stolen assets remain trackable. 83% of ETH haul converted to BTC across 6,954 wallets. Also launched $1M Boost Battle Trading Championship and MyBank retail banking product.
